title: A tech company will claim to have achieved AGI. The news media won’t be ready.
description: It’s gonna happen. Sometime in the next year, an executive from OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, or Meta will be standing on a brightly lit stage, in front of a screen full of benchmark scores, and claim that their latest AI model is proof that they have achieved Artificial General Intelligence (AGI). I fear that the news...
